values.description: SCP to deny resource creation without required tags
values.name: DenyResourceCreationWithoutTags

after.description: SCP to deny resource creation without required tags
after.name: DenyResourceCreationWithoutTags

description.constant_value: SCP to deny resource creation without required tags

control_tower_config.description:
value for the control tower configuration. 
 Options: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/controltower/latest/userguide/terminology.html

default_tags.description: value for default tags that will be applied in every resource

ops_profile.description: value for the profile that will be used to use the ops account

organization_member_accounts.description:
value for the member accounts that will be created in the organization. 
 If delete_on_termination is set to true, the member accounts will be deleted, if set to false, the member accounts will be remove from organization, but not deleted.

organization_policy_types.description:
value for the policy types that will be used to create the organization. 
 Options: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/organizations/latest/APIReference/API_EnablePolicyType.html

organization_services.description:
value for the service that will be used to create the organization 
 Options: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/organizations/latest/userguide/orgs_integrate_services_list.html

organization_units.description:
value for the units that will be used to create the organization. 
 Options: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/organizations/latest/APIReference/API_CreateOrganizationalUnit.html

scp_tag_enforce.description:
Value for the tag enforcement policy. 
 Best practices: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/tagging-best-practices/tagging-best-practices.html
